tidal:
hush
d7 $ silence
d6 $ silence
cps 1
d3 $ silence
d4 $ silence
d5 $ silence
let slicepat :: Pattern Int -> Int -> Pattern a -> Pattern a
    slicepat pi n p = Pattern f
    -- TODO deal with span vs span'
      where f a = concatMap (\(span, span', i) -> arc (compressTo span (zoomTo i p)) span) $ arc pi a
            zoomTo :: Int -> Pattern a -> Pattern a
            zoomTo i p = zoom ((fromIntegral (i `mod` n)) / fromIntegral n,
                               (fromIntegral ((i `mod` n)+1)) / fromIntegral n
                              ) p

let modNote n f p = stack [f $ filterValues (isEq n . (Map.!?n_p)) p,filterValues (not . isEq n . (Map.!?n_p)) p] where isEq a m = (isJust m) && (a == (fromJust $ fromV $ fromJust m))


hush
d2 $slow 2$ note (scaleP "ionian" "{c3 g3}%3") #s "sx7"  
d2 $slow 2 $ chop 4 $ nToOrbit $ modValuesF lpf_p ( 5000 <) ((#coarse 1).(#hall 0.5)) $ modNote 3 (#speed "<0.5 1>")$ n "{0 [~ 1] ~ <0 [0 0]> ~ 1}%5" #s "gen1" #comp 0.5 #speed 1 #lpf "<5000 9000 2400 8990>"
d3 $ slow 2 $ distrib [3,7,16] $ sound "bd" #orbit 0 #shape 0.5 #gain 1.2
d4 $ slow 2 $ distrib [2,7,16] $ sound "blp2:2" #orbit 1 #shape 0.5 #gain 1.2 #sparkle 1.5
d1$slow 12 $ slicepat "{0 <3 2> <1 2 1 0> [1 4]}" 4 $ n "{0 3 4 1}" # sound "abeat:8" #comp 0.5 #cut 1
d1 $ sometimes (someCyclesBy 0.6 (#speed 2))$ slow 12 $ slicepat "0 <3 2> <1 2 1> [1 4]" 4 $ n "{0 3 4*2 [5 2], 0 3*2 [2 8*2]}" # sound "juno" #gain 1.2 #hall 0.3 #orbit 5 |+|n 12

d5 $ note "~ ~ [c3 fs4 gs4]  <~ [gs3 <cs4 cs4 cs5>]>" #s "nord" #sustain 2 #gain 1 
d7 $ silence
